com.droidcare.control

Class UserManager

  • Object
    • UserManager

  • public class UserManager
extends Object
    Manages the current user of the application.
    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  UserManager.OnFinishListener
      Interface used to allow the SimpleHttpPost to run some code when it has finished executing.

      • createUser

        public User createUser(int id,
              String email,
              String fullName,
              String address,
              String phoneNumber,
              String country,
              String gender,
              String passportNumber,
              String nationality,
              String dateOfBirth,
              String type,
              String notification)
        Creates a new User object based on the given data
        Parameters:
        id - the user's ID
        email - the user's email
        fullName - the user's full name
        address - the user's address
        phoneNumber - the user's phone number
        country - the user's country
        gender - the user's gender
        passportNumber - the user's passport number
        nationality - the user's nationality
        dateOfBirth - the user's date of birth
        type - the user's type
        notification - the user's notification means preferences
        Returns:
        the created User object

      • editProfile

        public void editProfile(String password,
               String address,
               String phoneNumber,
               String country,
               String passportNumber,
               String nationality,
               String notificationTypeString,
               UserManager.OnFinishListener onFinishListener)
        Edit the profile information of the current application user
        Parameters:
        password - the user's new password
        address - the user's new address
        phoneNumber - the user's phone number
        country - the user's new country
        passportNumber - the user's new passport number
        nationality - the user's new nationality
        notificationTypeString - the user's new notification means preferences
        onFinishListener - an instance of OnFinishListener determining what to do after the user's profile is updated
